title: Prescription Details

xdm:prescriptionDeliveryEligible.title: Prescription Delivery Eligible
xdm:prescriptionDeliveryEligible.description: Indicates if the prescription available to be delivered.

xdm:prescriptionID.title: Prescription ID
xdm:prescriptionID.description: ID for the prescription being filled.

xdm:prescriptionRefill.title: Prescription Refill
xdm:prescriptionRefill.description: Indicates if the prescription is new or being refilled.

xdm:prescriptionRefillsRemaining.title: Prescription Refills Remaining
xdm:prescriptionRefillsRemaining.description: Count of the remaining prescription refills available.

xdm:prescriptionUpload.title: Prescription Upload
xdm:prescriptionUpload.description: Extension of the File Transfer data type.
